医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COST行动弥补了癌症免疫治疗研究的空白癌症仍然是全世界死亡的主要原因。全球范围内估计有 2000 万新发癌症病例和 1000 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240120/COST-Action-bridges-the-gap-in-cancer-immunotherapy-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240120/COST-Action-bridges-the-gap-in-cancer-immunotherapy-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45fbbeca-4507-4c39-9bb2-958e7498019d Sat, 20 Jan 2024 06:42:00 -0500 COST Action bridges the gap in cancer immunotherapy research
RecA 蛋白跳过 DNA 修复中的“解旋”步骤东京都立大学的研究人员一直在研究同源重组的 DNA 修复，其中 RecA 蛋白通过将悬挂的单链末端整合到完整的双链中来修复双链 DNA 中的断裂，并根据未损坏的序列修复断裂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240120/RecA- Protein-skips-unwinding-step-in-DNA-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240120/RecA- Protein-skips-unwinding-step-in-DNA-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23e1a152-b516-4be4-91ec-6b21e3f9f8bd Sat, 20 Jan 2024 06:36:00 -0500 RecA protein skips "unwinding" step in DNA repair
研究表明，与 COVID-19 相关的血浆炎症因子不会影响血脑屏障现在有充分证据表明，冠状病毒的爆发引发了全球健康危机。在这项研究中，研究人员想知道血脑屏障损伤是否会在 COVID-19 进展过程中导致神经系统问题的发生，以及影响程度如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/covid-19-关联-血液-血浆-炎症-因子-do-not-affect-blood-brain-barrier-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/covid-19-关联-血液-血浆-炎症-因子-do-not-affect-blood-brain-barrier-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d42bb9bd-d396-41f8-9e27-6a72676fa269 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:56:14 -0500 COVID-19-associated blood plasma inflammatory factors do not affect blood-brain barrier, study shows
免疫检查点抑制剂靶点被发现可促进皮肤癌生长程序性细胞死亡 1 (PD-1) 是免疫检查点抑制剂疗法的重要靶标，可阻断其信号传导并增强 T 细胞活性。 PD-1抑制剂已被批准用于治疗多种类型的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Immune-checkpoint-inhibitor-target-found-to-promote-skin-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Immune-checkpoint-inhibitor-target-found-to-promote-skin-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dea31e22-5070-4f1d-8e71-736bd7a4a523 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:37:38 -0500 Immune checkpoint inhibitor target found to promote skin cancer growth
使用人工智能打破阿片类药物成瘾循环当化学研究助理教授本·布朗思考阿片类药物的流行时，他从分子水平上看待这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Using-AI-to-break-the-opioid-addiction-cycle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Using-AI-to-break-the-opioid-addiction-cycle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699521d2-6377-4794-976c-a0efa2515604 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 23:22:37 -0500 Using AI to break the opioid addiction cycle
研究揭示了急诊室约束使用的种族和民族差异一项新的研究为越来越多的证据提供了更多数据，证明急诊室 (ED) 约束使用的差异，该研究已发表在学术急诊医学 (AEM) 1 月号上，该杂志是学术协会的同行评审期刊急诊医学（SAEM）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-reveals-disparities-in-emergency-department-restraint-use-by-race-and-ethnicity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86bd9ff6-a356-4a36-a7ed-b8f8661b7c57 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:52:27 -0500 Study reveals disparities in emergency department restraint use by race and ethnicity
蒙大拿州扩大疫苗宗教豁免的努力引发政治僵局蒙大拿州立法者与该州卫生部门就儿童保育许可规则的一揽子彻底改革陷入僵局，其中包括一项有争议的条款，允许宗教豁免儿童和工人的常规疫苗接种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Montanae28099s-effort-to-expand-religious-exemptions-to-vaccines-prompts-political-standoff.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=532bd855-44d1-417d-8e61-be825b5e6acd Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:00:02 -0500 Montana’s effort to expand religious exemptions to vaccines prompts political standoff
吸毒和酗酒的女性在寻求治疗时可能会感到耻辱一项新的研究发现，吸毒和酗酒的女性在寻求专业服务的支持时可能会感到耻辱和羞耻。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Women-using-drugs-and-alcohol-can-feel-stigmatized-when-seeking-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Women-using-drugs-and-alcohol-can-feel-stigmatized-when-seeking-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa17d8fc-d2f4-42c3-907d-eb7c0e6edf8f Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:55:00 -0500 Women using drugs and alcohol can feel stigmatized when seeking treatment
AI 利用新型 PHD 抑制剂治疗贫血取得突破临床阶段生成人工智能 (AI) 驱动的生物技术公司 InSilico Medicine (“InSilico”) 今天宣布，ACS Publications 旗下专注于分子结构和生物活性关键研究的期刊《Journal of Medicinal Chemistry》已发表该公司的发现一种用于治疗贫血的新型 PHD 抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-scores-breakthrough-in-anemia-treatment-with-novel-PHD-inhibitor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/AI-scores-breakthrough-in-anemia-treatment-with-novel-PHD-inhibitor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fda317ac-053f-44c4-ba61-122bcc77a644 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:47:00 -0500 AI scores breakthrough in anemia treatment with novel PHD inhibitor
Insilico Medicine 利用人工智能确定乳腺癌和妇科癌症有前景的新靶点Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能（AI）驱动的药物发现公司，最近发表了一项早期研究，确定 MYT1 是乳腺癌和妇科癌症的一个有前景的新治疗靶点，并发现了一系列专门针对 MYT1 的新型、有效、高选择性抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insilico-Medicine-leverages-AI-to-identify-promising-new-target-for-breast-and-gynecological-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Insilico-Medicine-leverages-AI-to-identify-promising-new-target-for-breast-and-gynecological-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cfbc25d-3be5-4515-b5ea-b02b239a37a7 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 13:40:00 -0500 Insilico Medicine leverages AI to identify promising new target for breast and gynecological cancers
